terms: तत्त्वबोधः (tattvabodhaḥ) means "knowledge of the truth" or "understanding of the ultimate reality." It refers to the realization of the highest spiritual knowledge.

meaning: Meaning: How can one attain the knowledge of the ultimate truth without your benevolent glance?Overall, the verse questions the possibility of gaining profound spiritual knowledge without the divine grace or blessing. It emphasizes the importance of the divine presence for the attainment of profound wisdom and enlightenment.
